TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WmpBitmapDecoder extends System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder
Public NotInheritable Class WmpBitmapDecoder Inherits BitmapDecoder

Docs.summary: Defines a decoder for Microsoft Windows Media Photo encoded images.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wdp](~/includes/tlasharptla-wdp-md.md)] 是一种新的编解码器，提供比具有较小文件大小的 JPEG 图像保真度更高和更多的功能。 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wdp](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wdp-md.md)] 映像通过使用单一算法实现有损和无损压缩。 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wdp](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wdp-md.md)] 映像支持现有的元数据标准。 有关此格式的其他信息，请参阅[Windows Media 照片规范](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/wmphoto.mspx)。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IO.Stream bitmapStream, valuetype System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions createOptions, valuetype System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption cacheOption) cil managed
Public Sub New (bitmapStream As Stream, createOptions As BitmapCreateOptions, cacheOption As BitmapCacheOption)

Docs.param: Initialization options for the bitmap image.
The caching method for the bitmap image.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of from the specified file stream with the specified and .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad>缓存选项，如果你想要关闭`bitmapStream`解码器创建后。 默认值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnDemand>缓存选项保留对流的访问权限，直至需要位图和清理由垃圾回收器。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建的实例并使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapDecoder>从文件流。 已解码的映像用作源<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>控件。
[!code-cpp[wdpbitmapdecoderencoder#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WdpBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/WDPEncoderDecoder.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[wdpbitmapdecoderencoder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WdpBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/WDPEncoderDecoder.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wdpbitmapdecoderencoder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/WdpBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/WDPEncoderDecoder.vb#1)]

Docs.exception: The is not a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wdp](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wdp-md.md)] encoded image.

## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建的实例并使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.WmpBitmapDecoder>从<xref:System.Uri>。 已解码的映像用作源<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>控件。
